chanceCards.text: Bank error in your favor – collect $75
Go to Jail – Do not pass Go, do not collect $200
Take a walk on the Boardwalk.
You have won second prize in a beauty contest – Collect $10
You have been elected Chairman of the Board – Pay each player $50
Advance to the nearest Railroad. If unowned, you may buy it. If owned, throw dice and pay the owner twice the rental to which he is otherwise entitled.
Advance to the nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it. If owned, throw dice and pay the owner twice the rental to which he is otherwise entitled.
Pay $15 for repairs on each of your houses
Pay $100 for repairs on your hotel

communityChestCards.text: Go to Jail – Do not pass Go, do not collect $200
Bank error in your favor – collect $200
You have won second prize in a beauty contest – Collect $100
From sale of stock you get $50
You are assessed for street repairs – $40 per house, $115 per hotel
You are the beneficiary of a will – Collect $50
It is your birthday – Collect $10 from each player
